      • checkDuplicated

        static boolean checkDuplicated(Customer newCustomer)
        This function checks the name and address of new customer.
        Parameters:
        newCustomer - The new customer which will be checked.
        Returns:
        True: If exist an old customer whose name and address are both same with new customer.
